info.description: For managers, plan shift schedules, broadcast open and unfilled shifts to your team. For team members, easily view your shifts and make schedule-change requests (swap/offer/time off).
info.title: Shifts for Microsoft Teams

get.description: This operation retrieves a list of all the Teams (Office 365 Groups) you are a member of.

value.description: List of one or more Teams you are a part of.

id.description: Unique ID of the Team (O365 group).

get.description: This operation returns details of a Schedule using the Schedule's unique ID.

get.x-ms-summary: List all Time Off instances in a Schedule
get.description: This operation returns all Time Off instances in a Schedule

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.fffZ (UTC format)

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.fffZ (UTC format)

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Items per page (enable Pagination under .../Settings)

post.summary: Create a new Time Off instance
post.x-ms-summary: Create a new Time Off instance
post.description: This operation creates a new Time Off instance and assigns it to a member of the team

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: The request to create a Time Off instance

get.x-ms-summary: Get a Time Off by ID

parameters.name: timeOffId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Time Off.

delete.description: This operation deletes a Time Off using its unique ID.

parameters.name: timeOffId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Time Off.

get.description: This operation returns all Shifts assigned to members of a team

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.fffZ (UTC format)

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.fffZ (UTC format)

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Items per page (enable Pagination under .../Settings)

post.description: This operation creates a new Shift and assigns it to a member of the team

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: The request to create a Shift

get.description: This operation returns details for a Shift using the Shift's unique ID.

parameters.name: shiftId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Shift.

delete.description: This operation deletes a Shift using the Shift's unique ID.

parameters.name: shiftId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Shift.

parameters.description: Items per page (enable Pagination under .../Settings)

parameters.description: The unique ID of the Open Shift.

parameters.description: The request to update an Open Shift.

delete.description: This operation deletes an Open Shift.

parameters.description: The unique ID of the Open Shift.

get.description: This operation returns the list of Time Off Reasons associated with a team.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Items per page (enable Pagination under .../Settings)

get.description: This operation returns all Scheduling Groups in a Schedule.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Items per page (enable Pagination under .../Settings)

get.description: This operation returns details for a Scheduling Group using its unique ID.

get.description: This operation returns all Time Off requests in a Schedule.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Items per page (enable Pagination under .../Settings)

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Request state filter

get.x-ms-summary: Get a Time Off request by ID
get.description: This operation returns a Time Off request by ID.

parameters.name: timeOffRequestId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Time Off request

post.description: This operation allows managers to approve a Time Off request.

parameters.name: timeOffRequestId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Time Off request

schema.description: Manager approves a Time Off request.

message.description: A message from the manager to the sender/recipient when a request is accepted.

post.description: This operation allows managers to decline a Time Off request.

parameters.name: timeOffRequestId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Time Off request

schema.description: Manager declines a Time Off request.

message.description: A message from the manager to the sender/recipient when a request is declined.

get.description: This operation returns all Offer Shift requests in a Schedule.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Items per page (enable Pagination under .../Settings)

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Request state filter

get.x-ms-summary: Get an Offer Shift request by ID
get.description: This operation returns an Offer Shift request by ID.

parameters.name: offerShiftRequestId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Offer Shift request

post.description: This operation allows recipients/managers to approve an Offer Shift request.

parameters.name: offerShiftRequestId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Offer Shift request

message.description: A message when a request is accepted.

post.description: This operation allows users to decline an Offer Shift request.

parameters.name: offerShiftRequestId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Offer Shift request

schema.description: Recipient/Manager declines an Offer Shift request.

message.description: A message when a request is declined.

get.description: This operation returns all Swap Shifts requests in a Schedule.

parameters.description: Items per page (enable Pagination under .../Settings)

parameters.description: Request state filter

parameters.description: The unique ID of the request

post.description: This operation allows a user to approve a Swap Shifts request.

parameters.name: swapShiftsChangeRequestId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the request

schema.description: Approve a Swap Shifts change request.

message.description: A message when a request is accepted.

post.description: This operation allows users to decline a Swap Shifts request.

parameters.name: swapShiftsChangeRequestId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the request

schema.description: Decline a Swap Shifts change request.

message.description: A message when a request is declined.

get.description: This operation returns all Open Shift change requests in a Schedule.

parameters.description: Items per page (enable Pagination under .../Settings)

message.description: A message from the manager to the sender/recipient when a request is accepted.

schema.description: Manager declines an Open Shift change request.

message.description: A message from the manager to the sender/recipient when a request is declined.

get.description: This operation returns Open Shifts that need to be filled from all your teams.

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: Get open shifts starting after time. Use format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.fffZ

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: Get open shifts ending before time. Use format:yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.fffZ

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: How many open shifts to fetch

post.summary: When an Open Shift request is created, updated or deleted
post.x-ms-summary: When an Open Shift request is created, updated or deleted
post.description: This operation triggers when an Open Shift request is created, updated or deleted.

default.description: default response for a trigger subscription

post.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, create an Open Shift change request.

patch.description: Renew a Microsoft Graph webhook subscription by updating its expiration time.

expirationDateTime.description: Specify the date and time, in UTC format, of when the Microsoft Graph webhook subscription expires. The maximum expiration time for security alerts is 43200 minutes (under 30 days).
expirationDateTime.title: Expiration date time

post.summary: Proxy endpoint to validate subscriptions and forward notifications
post.description: Proxy endpoint that receives notifications from the GraphAPI and validates subscriptions.

notificationUrl.description: Specify a well-formed URL of the endpoint that will receive notifications.
notificationUrl.title: Notification URL

WebhookPushResponse.description: Payload from backend containing subscription metadata as well as data

id.description: ID of the resource that is updated.

teamId.description: ID of team where the update happened.

resource.title: Resource
resource.description: Specifies the resource that will be monitored for changes.

applicationId.title: Application Id
applicationId.description: Identifier of the application used to create the subscription.

changeType.title: Change type
changeType.description: Indicates the type of change in the subscribed resource that will raise a notification.

clientState.title: Client state
clientState.description: Specifies the value of the clientState property sent by the service in each notification. The maximum length is 128 characters. The client can check that the notification came from the service by comparing the value of the clientState property sent with the subscription with the value of the clientState property received with each notification.

notificationUrl.title: Notification URL
notificationUrl.description: The URL of the endpoint that will receive the notifications. This URL must make use of the HTTPS protocol.

expirationDateTime.title: Expiration date time
expirationDateTime.description: Specifies the date and time when the webhook subscription expires (UTC).

creatorId.title: Creator Id
creatorId.description: Identifier of the user or service principal that created the subscription. If the app used delegated permissions to create the subscription, this field contains the id of the signed-in user the app called on behalf of. If the app used application permissions, this field contains the id of the service principal corresponding to the app.
